name: v2 Organization, Agency, Department
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0530 ( Organization, Agency, Department)

extension.valueString: The US Drug Enforcement Administration does not solely assign DEA numbers in the United States. Hospitals have the authority to issue DEA numbers to their medical residents. These DEA numbers are based upon the hospital's DEA number, but the authority res
In some countries e.g. the US, more than one department may issue a military identifier. Hence, US is not sufficient as the Assigning Authority.
